ing: 4 (15.25 ounce) cans Del MonteÂ® Whole Kernel Corn, well drained
1 1/2 cups croutons or crackers, finely crushed
des: "Creamy and savory-sweet, this casserole pairs with turkey and ham alike. Try the different stir-ins and toppings to make it your own Â– your family will love it lots of ways."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Toss together Cheddar cheese, flour and pepper in a medium bowl; set aside.
Stir together milk, cream cheese, 1/3 cup green onions and hot sauce in a 9x13-inch baking dish. Add corn and shredded cheese mixture; stir well to blend evenly. Cover and bake 30 minutes.
Uncover and sprinkle with remaining 1/3 cup green onions and optional toppings, as desired. Bake 5 minutes longer.
